ruleBookInfo:
{
  "author": "##:author\"[^\"]+\"([^\"]*)##$1###",
  "coverUrl": "##og:image\"[^\"]+\"([^\"]*)##$1###",
  "intro": "<js>\nvar doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);\n'最近更新：'+doc.selectFirst('.uptime').text()+'\\n'+doc.selectFirst('#bookintro').html()\n</js>",
  "kind": "##:category\"[^\"]+\"([^\"]*)##$1###",
  "lastChapter": "##_chapter_name\"[^\"]+\"([^\"]*)##$1###",
  "name": "##:book_name\"[^\"]+\"([^\"]*)##$1###",
  "tocUrl": "##novel:read_url\"[^\"]+\"([^\"]*)##$1###",
  "wordCount": "@css:li:contains(字　数：)@text##字　数："
}
